Body: Description: Hello, I am having an issue with my Seek jobs. I am getting a database error. See Error Below Error during processing: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Data.SQLite, Version=1.0.117.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=db937bc2d44ff139' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040)

There is a KB for how to solve this, but also an open escalation to investigate why this is happening.

 

KB: https://nwxcorp.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/General__kav/ka0Qk0000006fq5IAA/view?ws=%2Flightning%2Fr%2FCase%2F500Qk00000IEbQOIA1%2Fview

 

Escalation Ticket: 00427172
Next Steps Updated: Apply Knowledge SEEK System Scan Error:  Could Not Load File or Assembly
What We've Learned Updated: Per prior cases this is a known bug
Collect logs (@Dusty Grayson​ please grab DEBUG logs for the job and application), escalate, resolve issue for customer with KB, close as Pending Fix Availability, Reopen Escalation Ticket

Next Steps Updated: Apply Knowledge SEEK System Scan Error:  Could Not Load File or Assembly

Linked to Escalation Ticket Number  00427172.
